metadata.title: CVE-2022-48340 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: In Gluster GlusterFS 11.0, there is an xlators/cluster/dht/src/dht-common.c dht_setxattr_mds_cbk use-after-free.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-07-18, no fix has been commited upstream

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in kinetic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-07-18').
